greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Triangle read by rows in which row n lists n terms, starting with n, such that the difference between successive terms is equal to n^3 - 1 = A068601(n).
comment: See also the triangles of A162614 and A162616.
link: Harvey P. Dale, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..10000
formula: Row sums: n*(n^4 - n^3 + n + 1)/2. - _R. J. Mathar_, Jul 20 2009
results.author: _Omar E. Pol_, Jul 12 2009
ext: Terms beyond the 6th row from _R. J. Mathar_ and _Max Alekseyev_, Feb 05 2010
